creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: many women, men and children on beach at right, some standing and some digging in sand with their hands and staffs; boat in foreground at left, with a man carrying a woman in blue piggyback out of boat; more boats in middle ground near horizon line; low mountains at right; mounted on foamcore board with grey silk edging
title: Clam Digging
